title: From repairs to resale, survey reveals why most EV owners in India want to switch back to ICE vehicles
description: According to Park+ survey, 51% of electric vehicle owners in India considered switching back to ICE vehicles due to charging anxiety, high maintenance costs, and low resale values. TATA Nexon EV was the most popular choice. The study underlined the importance of developing a more robust EV charging infrastructure.
